northstar

Tidy Healthcare Revenue Integrity Tools


üì¶ Installation

You can install northstar from GitHub with:

# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("andrewallenbruce/northstar")

üî∞ Usage 

library(northstar)
library(dplyr)

HCPCS 

# hcpcs_search(hcpcs    = "33935", 
#              state    = "GA", 
#              locality = "01", 
#              mac      = "10212") |> 
#   glimpse()

ICD-10-CM 

icd10cm(code = "T38.0X1A") |> glimpse()
> Rows: 1
> Columns: 8
> $ ch          <int> 19
> $ abbrev      <chr> "INJ"
> $ chapter     <chr> "Injury, poisoning and certain other consequences of exter‚Ä¶
> $ range       <chr> "S00 - T88"
> $ order       <int> 75443
> $ valid       <int> 1
> $ code        <chr> "T38.0X1A"
> $ description <chr> "Poisoning by glucocorticoids and synthetic analogues, acc‚Ä¶
icd_sections(code = "T38.0X1A") |> glimpse()
> Rows: 1
> Columns: 4
> $ code        <chr> "T38.0X1A"
> $ section     <chr> "T38"
> $ description <chr> "Poisoning by, adverse effect of and underdosing of hormon‚Ä¶
> $ n           <int> 336

Physician Fee Schedule 

calculate_amounts(
  wrvu  = 6.26,
  nprvu = 7.92,
  fprvu = 4.36,
  mrvu  = 0.99,
  cf    = 32.744,
  wgpci = 1,
  pgpci = 0.883,
  mgpci = 1.125
)
> Facility Amounts:
> 
> RVU Total ............ 11.22
> Participating ........ $367.51
> Non-Particpating ..... $349.13
> Limiting Charge ...... $401.50
> 
> Non-Facility Amounts:
> 
> RVU Total ............ 14.37
> Participating ........ $470.44
> Non-Particpating ..... $446.91
> Limiting Charge ...... $513.95

Please note that the northstar project is released with a Contributor Code of Conduct. By contributing to this project, you agree to abide by its terms.

üèõÔ∏è Governance

This project is primarily maintained by Andrew Bruce. Other authors may occasionally assist with some of these duties.
